text: The Huawei P30, Huawei P30 Pro and Huawei P30 Lite are smartphones developed and made by Huawei. They were released on March 26, 2019. It runs EMUI 9 with Android 9 for the first time. They currently runs EMUI 12 with Android 10 in worldwide. == Hardware == Huawei P30 Pro has IP68 water resistance up to 1.5m for 30 minutes, Huawei P30 has a IP53 water resistance, Huawei P30 has a 6.1 inch OLED display and Huawei P30 Pro has a 6.47 inch OLED display. Huawei P30 and Huawei P30 Pro has a 32MP front camera, Huawei P30 has a 3650mAh battery capacity and Huawei P30 Pro has a 4200mAh battery capacity, Huawei P30 and Huawei P30 Pro has a Kirin 980 (7nm) chipset, Huawei P30 Lite has a Kirin 710 (12 nm) chipset. Huawei P30 has a three rear camera such as 40MP wide rear camera, 8MP telephoto rear camera and 16MP ultrawide rear camera. Huawei P30 Pro has a three rear camera such as 40MP wide rear camera, 8MP telephoto rear camera and 20MP ultrawide rear camera. == Software == They runs Android 9 for the first time. Huawei P30 global users currently runs EMUI 12 with Android 10 and Huawei P30 chinese users currently runs new operating system called HarmonyOS 2.0. ==References== ==Other websites== *Huawei P30 *Huawei P30 Pro *Huawei P30 lite Category:Huawei mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: Huawei P30
